tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE expenses (  expense_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,  category VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,  amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,  date DATE NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE trends (  trend_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,  category VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,  average_amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,  prediction_date DATE NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE records (  record_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,  category VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,  record_date DATE NOT NULL,  amount DECIMAL NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE expenses (id INT PRIMARY KEY, amount DECIMAL, category VARCHAR(255), date TIMESTAMP)

CREATE TABLE forecasts ( 
    forecast_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    forecast_date DATE NOT NULL, 
    forecast_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL, 
    trend_id INT NOT NULL, 
    FOREIGN KEY (trend_id) REFERENCES trends(trend_id) 
);

CREATE TABLE analysis ( 
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    analysis_date DATE NOT NULL, 
    analysis_result VARCHAR(1000) NOT NULL, 
    trend_id INT NOT NULL, 
    FOREIGN KEY (trend_id) REFERENCES trends(trend_id) 
);
